links.title: Last Night Run
links.tooltip: Dashboard adjusted to last night observation period, from 19:00 to 7:00

links.title: Previous Night Run
links.tooltip: Dashboard adjusted to the previous night observation period, from 19:00 to 7:00

targets.expr:
(
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{})
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{})
)
